urbit@urbit.org

odors

@c              UTF-32 codepoint
@d              date
  @da           absolute date
  @dr           relative date (ie, timespan)
@f              yes or no (inverse boolean)
@n              nil
@p              phonemic base
@r              IEEE floating-point
  @rd           double precision  (64 bits)
  @rh           half precision (16 bits)
  @rq           quad precision (128 bits)
  @rs           single precision (32 bits)
@s              signed integer, sign bit low
  @sb           signed binary
  @sd           signed decimal
  @sv           signed base32
  @sw           signed base64
  @sx           signed hexadecimal
@t              UTF-8 text (cord)
  @ta           ASCII text (span)
    @tas        ASCII symbol (term)
@u              unsigned integer
  @ub           unsigned binary
  @ud           unsigned decimal
  @uv           unsigned base32
  @uw           unsigned base64
  @ux           unsigned hexadecimal

Size:

A   1 bit
B   2 bits
C   4 bits
D   1 byte
E   2 bytes
F   4 bytes
G   8 bytes
H   16 bytes
I   32 bytes
J   64 bytes
K   128 bytes
L   256 bytes
M   512 bytes
N   1K
O   2K
P   4K
Q   8K
R   16K
S   32K
T   64K
U   128K
V   256K
W   512K
X   1MB
Y   2MB
Z   4MB
